mapper.select: SELECT BPM_BPLAN_IDX , BOARD_IDX , TITLE_REMARK1 , TITLE_REMARK2 , TITLE_REMARK3 , WRITER , REG_DATE , MOD_DATE FROM EMP_BPM_BPLAN WHERE BPM_BPLAN_IDX = #{bpm_bplan_idx}

SELECT COUNT(BPM_BPLAN_IDX) FROM EMP_BPM_BPLAN WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
AND BPM_BPLAN_IDX > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMP_FILE( FILE_IDX, BOARD_IDX, BOARD_LIST_IDX, FILE_FNAME, FILE_SNAME, FILE_SIZE )VALUES( SEQ_FILE_IDX.NEXTVAL, 2, #{bpm_bplan_idx}, #{file_fname}, #{file_sname}, #{file_size} )
mapper.select:
SELECT FILE_IDX, FILE_FNAME, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE
FROM EMP_FILE WHERE BOARD_LIST_IDX = #{bpm_bplan_idx} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY FILE_IDX ASC
SELECT FILE_SNAME, FILE_FNAME FROM EMP_FILE WHERE FILE_IDX = #{FILE_IDX}
